nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function provides the possibility to change the owner
 @param _to The new owner of this contract
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation:
@title Permissioned
 @notice This contract defines a permission policy and provides the functions to grant/revoke permissions to certain users/contracts. A Permissioned contract should be a contract with the purpouse to be accessed only by authorized entities
nodes.name: Permissioned

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The owner cannot grant permission to himself"

arguments.value: The owner cannot grant permission to himself

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The owner cannot grant permission to himself"

nodes.name: grantPermission

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You cannot revoke permission to other users"

arguments.value: You cannot revoke permission to other users

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You cannot revoke permission to other users"

nodes.name: revokePermission
checkForPermission
getPolicy

nodes.documentation:
@notice Similar to Permissioned but with a different semantic. This contract stores a commitment of user => amount that means
 "This address owns me "amount" "
